modName: Headhunterz's Dragonborn remix menu theme replace
summary: Head-banging Hardstyle Dragonborn remix replace for menu theme.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][color=#8e7cc3] [font=Times New Roman][size=2]Headhunterz, [b][i]Headhunterz[/i][/b]
by his music is sworn
To keep boredom forever at bay!
And the fiercest fans rout
when they hear triumph's bassdrum,
Headhunterz, for your melodies we pray![/size][/font]

[/color][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]---

[/font][/i][/b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]If you like [color=#00ff00]Hardstyle[/color] music as I do, you should download this mod.
It's a little thing I did a while ago just for myself.

There's an awesome "Dragonborn" song remix made by Headhunterz:
I simply cut two parts of the song ([color=#93c47d]intro[/color] and [color=#a2c4c9]climax[/color]), tweaked the [color=#00ff00]EQ
[/color]a bit and then converted those files in the correct Skyrim audio format.

---

Mod file contains:
- [color=#93c47d]Intro part ([/color][color=#00ff00]enhanced[/color][color=#93c47d] version)[/color]; [i][color=#444444]<-- the one I use[/color][/i]
- [color=#93c47d]Intro part (original version)[/color];
- [color=#a2c4c9]Climax part ([/color][color=#00ff00]enhanced[/color][color=#a2c4c9] version)[/color];
- [color=#a2c4c9]Climax part (original version)[/color].

[i]- (COMING SOON) Small [color=#dbb0a7]demo.mp3[/color] track that demonstrates the differences
  between mod variants without you trying each one of them.[/i]

---

[u]Manual install[/u] only, sorry...
Installation instructions can be found inside [color=#dbb0a7]readme.txt[/color].

---

Watch and listen to the full original song:[/font]

[youtube]VaiHTvifGt0[/youtube]
author: Abstractn
